comment.author: 69005233@N00
comment._content: My great-grandparents, John Burpee & Mary Mutty and their children lived in Bangor and their home was destroyed in this fire. Shortly afterwards, they left Bangor and took up residence in Lewiston. -- Seen in your News in the 1910s set. (?)

comment.author: 8152932@N06
comment._content: @Brenda  Same here, relatives that were forced to move due to the fire.
